Effect.name: BigDustPuff
Effect.args: posX; posY; posZ; duration
Effect.desc: Burst of large transparent smoke.

Effect.name: BigSmokePuff
Effect.args: posX; posY; posZ
Effect.desc: Large cluster of small smoke puffs, grey and opaque.

Effect.args: subtype; posX; posY; posZ
Effect.desc: Grey transparent dust particles from a stationary emitter. Used for landing.

Effect.args: subtype; posX; posY; posZ; velocity X; velocity Z
Effect.desc: Grey transparent dust particles from an emitter that moves over time. Used with walking.

Effect.args: subtype; posX; posY; posZ
Effect.desc: Ring of flowers thrown into the air when Mario jumps from flower patches of Flower Fields.

Effect.args: subtype; posX; posY; posZ
Effect.desc: Random-colored flowers created by walking around in flower patches of Flower Fields.

Subtype.name: Flower:Trail:Auto
Subtype.desc: Will vanish after a fixed time.

Effect.name: Cloud:Puff
Effect.args: posX; posY; posZ
Effect.desc: Used by HuffNPuff and on Cloudy Climb maps.

Effect.args: subtype; posX; posY; posZ
Effect.desc: Yellow cloud sprites created by walking around in Cloudy Climb.

Subtype.name: Cloud:Trail:Auto
Subtype.desc: Will vanish after a fixed time.

Effect.name: FloatingFlower
Effect.args: posX; posY; posZ; duration
Effect.desc: Used by HuffNPuff and on Cloudy Climb maps.

Effect.name: Snowflake
Effect.args: posX; posY; posZ; duration
Effect.desc: A single snowflake falls.

subtype; posX; posY; posZ; duration
Effect.desc: Four green leaves fall from an emitter, vanishing after a short time

Subtype.name: DropLeaves:Point
Subtype.desc: tossed up from point before falling

Effect.args: subtype; posX; posY; posZ; duration
subtype; posX; posY; posZ; height above ground to break
Effect.desc: Pieces of stone walls that fall and shatter in Koopa Bros Fortress

Effect.args: subtype; posX; posY; posZ
Effect.desc: Creates a ring of smoke effects that move outward radially. Each subtype starts further out.

Effect.args: subtype; posX; posY; posZ; directionX; directionY; directionZ; num stars
Effect.desc: Multi-colored stars that appear when damage is dealt/taken arranged in various patterns.

Subtype.name: Stars:Fountain1
Subtype.desc: rise, linger shortly, begin spinning, vanish

Subtype.name: Stars:Fountain2
Subtype.desc: similar to previous with faster spinning

Subtype.name: Stars:Fountain3
Subtype.desc: rapidly rise and begin to fall

Effect.desc: Explosion similar to Bombette's blast. Each subtype is larger than the last.

Effect.desc: White outline shown around new equipment when acquired.

Effect.desc: A large white aura appears and pulses in size for some time.

Effect.desc: A ring of smoke particle fly out from a point, float upward, and vanish.

Effect.desc: A huge shockwave bursts out of the ground (very cool effect).

Effect.desc: A random musical note is emitted. It moves straight in one direction.

Effect.desc: A burst of smoke radiates from a point.
